name: Ahri
title: the Nine-Tailed Fox
lore: Innately connected to the latent power of Runeterra, Ahri is a vastaya who can reshape magic into orbs of raw energy. She revels in toying with her prey by manipulating their emotions before devouring their life essence. Despite her predatory nature, Ahri retains a sense of empathy as she receives flashes of memory from each soul she consumes.
blurb: Innately connected to the latent power of Runeterra, Ahri is a vastaya who can reshape magic into orbs of raw energy. She revels in toying with her prey by manipulating their emotions before devouring their life essence. Despite her predatory nature...
allytips: Use Charm to set up your combos, it will make landing Orb of Deception and Fox-Fire dramatically easier.
Initiate team fights using Charm, and chase down stragglers with Spirit Rush.
Spirit Rush enables Ahri's abilities, it opens up paths for Charm, helps double hitting with Orb of Deception, and closes to make use of Fox-Fire.
enemytips: Ahri's survivability is dramatically reduced when her Ultimate, Spirit Rush, is down.
Stay behind minions to make Charm difficult to land, this will reduce Ahri's damage potential significantly.

riot_spells.name: Orb of Deception
riot_spells.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. After earning several spell hits, Ahri's next orb hits will restore her health.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on the way out, and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage on the way back.

Ahri's abilities generate Essence Theft stacks when they hit enemies (max {{ f4.0 }} per cast). At {{ f3.0 }} stacks, Ahri's next Orb of Deception that lands a hit will restore {{ f1.0 }} (+{{ f2.-1 }}) health for each enemy hit.

riot_spells.name: Fox-Fire
riot_spells.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Releases fox-fires that seek nearby enemies and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take {{ e2 }}% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.

Fox-fire prioritizes champions recently hit by Charm, then enemies Ahri recently attacked.
If Fox-fire cannot find a priority target, it targets champions over the nearest enemy if possible.

riot_spells.name: Charm
riot_spells.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her. The target temporarily takes increased damage from Ahri.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Blows a kiss that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms the first enemy hit, causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s) and immediately stopping any in-progress movement abilities.

Enemies hit by Charm become vulnerable for {{ e5 }} seconds, taking {{ e4 }}% more damage from Ahri's abilities.

riot_spells.name: Spirit Rush
riot_spells.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Nimbly dashes forward firing {{ rmaxtargetspercast }} essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizing champions) dealing {{ rcalculateddamage }} magic damage.

Can be cast up to {{ rmaxcasts }} times within {{ rrecastwindow }} seconds before going on cooldown.

riot_passive.name: Vastayan Grace
riot_passive.description: Whenever Ahri's spells hit a champion 2 times within a short period, she briefly gains movement speed.

i1.name: Vastayan Grace
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Ahri''' lands 2 ability hits against a champion within {{fd|1.5}} seconds, she gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds.

q1.name: Orb of Deception
q1.blurb: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.
q1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Whenever '''Ahri''' hits an enemy with one of her abilities, she gains a charge of ''Essence Theft'', and can gain up to 3 charges per ability cast. Upon reaching 9 charges, her next ''Orb of Deception'' {{tip|heals}} her for {{sti|health|{{pp|4|3;5;9;18|1 to 16|color=health}} {{as|(+ 9% AP)}}}} every time an enemy is hit.
q1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ahri''' sends an orb of arcane energy in the target direction, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies it passes through, then pulls it back, dealing {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} instead.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Damage Per Pass|{{ap|40 to 140}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Orb of Deception'' functions normally during flight regardless of '''Ahri's''' condition.
* Each pass of the projectile can only damage an enemy once.
* If '''Ahri''' is performing an attack animation when the orb switches direction, the attack animation is canceled.
* {{si|Flash}} can be cast during the cast animation of ''Orb of Deception''. If done so, the ability resolves after {{si|Flash}} from the location '''Ahri''' flashed to.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only a single instance of damage.

w1.name: Fox-Fire
w1.blurb: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ahri''' summons three spectral flames which orbit her for up to 5 seconds.
w1.description2: Flames prioritize champions hit by {{ai|Charm|Ahri}} or any enemy hit by '''Ahri's''' last basic attack, within 3 seconds and {{sti|range|725 range}}.
w1.description3: After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, each flame targets a prioritized enemy, or after {{fd|0.4}} seconds pursues the closest visible enemy in range, prioritizing champions, then the target of '''Ahri's''' last basic attack, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
w1.description4: Multiple flames can hit the same target, with each flame beyond the first dealing 30% damage.
w1.leveling4: {{st|Additional Magic Damage|{{ap|12|19.5|27|34.5|42}} {{as|(+ 9% AP)}}|Total Single Target Damage|{{ap|64|104|144|184|224}} {{as|(+ 48% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* ''Fox-Fire'' has no casting time and will not interrupt '''Ahri's''' previous orders.
* ''Fox-Fire's'' targeting priority is as follows:
** The enemy champion closest to the orb's location
** The target of '''Ahri's''' last autoattack
** The enemy unit closest to the orb's location
* '''Ahri''' must have sight of an enemy in order for ''Fox-Fire'' to target them. Once targeted, the missiles will chase its target even if Ahri loses sight.
* If the target of ''Fox-Fire'' dies, the missile will fizzle.
* Any unused ''Fox-Fires'' will fizzle on '''Ahri's''' death.
* If '''Ahri''' uses {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}} while ''Fox-Fire'' is active, any orbs that have not acquired a target will fizzle.
* The cooldown of ''Fox-Fire'' begin once all the orbs have been cast or timed-out.
* Each missile of ''Fox-Fire'' has its own range.

e1.name: Charm
e1.blurb: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ahri''' blows a kiss in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit, interrupting in-progress dashes, {{tip|charm|charming}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 65%.
e1.description2: An enemy hit by ''Charm'' is vulnerable for 3 seconds, taking 20% '''bonus''' damage from '''Ahri's''' abilities.
e1.notes:
* The damage amplification also affects the true damage portion of {{ai|Orb of Deception|Ahri}}.
* If the charmed enemy does not have sight of '''Ahri''' they will stand still for its duration.
* The effect ends if '''Ahri''' dies.
* {{si|Flash}} can be cast during the cast animation of ''Charm''.

r1.name: Spirit Rush
r1.blurb: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ahri''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, and then fires energy bolts up to 3 visible targets to deal {{as|magic damage}}.
r1.description2: ''Spirit Rush'' can be recast twice more at a 1 second {{tt|static cooldown|unaffected by cooldown reduction}} within 10 seconds of activation at no additional cost.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Maximum single target damage|{{ap|180|270|360}} {{as|(+ 105% AP)}}|Maximum damage|{{ap|540|810|1080}} {{as|(+ 315% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* Each dash counts as another ability instance for the purposes of effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Spirit Rush'' uses [[quick cast]] by default.
* '''Ahri''' must have sight of an enemy in order for ''Spirit Rush'' to target them. Once targeted, the bolts will chase its target even if '''Ahri''' loses sight of them.
** Even if '''Ahri''' gets vision of the fog of war after dashing, it's possible that ''Spirit Rush'' will not target any enemy.
* If '''Ahri''' dies mid-dash, she will not fire the bolts.
